sentences.en: A patient going through acute detox will have an assigned nurse nearby.
sentences.cn: 接受急性脱瘾治疗的病人身边会有一名指派的护士看护。

sentences.en: At a nearby table a man was complaining in a loud voice.
sentences.cn: 邻桌的一位男士当时正高声地抱怨着。

sentences.en: Danny looked down at the stream bubbling through the trees nearby.
sentences.cn: 丹尼朝下望去，只见溪水潺潺流过附近的树林。

sentences.en: Fifty soldiers were taking an early morning bathe in a nearby lake.
sentences.cn: 清晨,50名士兵正在附近的湖里游泳.

sentences.en: He might easily have been seen by someone who lived nearby.
sentences.cn: 住在附近的人很可能有谁见过他。

sentences.en: He spoke softly to a couple standing nearby.
sentences.cn: 他轻声和站在旁边的一对夫妇说话。

sentences.en: Lucy was staying in the nearby town of Hamilton
sentences.cn: 露西当时住在附近的汉密尔顿镇。

sentences.en: Lucy was staying in the nearby town of Hamilton.
sentences.cn: 露西当时住在附近的汉密尔顿镇。

sentences.en: Nancy dropped into a nearby chair.
sentences.cn: 南希疲惫地瘫坐到近处的椅子上。

sentences.en: Nearby there is a stretch of white sand beach perfect for sunbathing.
sentences.cn: 附近有一片白色沙滩，是沐日光浴的绝佳场所。

sentences.en: Nearby, nestling in the hills, was the children's home.
sentences.cn: 孩子们的家就在附近的山里。

sentences.en: Officers will also continue their search of nearby open ground.
sentences.cn: 警察还将继续在附近的开阔地带搜寻。

sentences.en: The helicopter crashed to earth nearby.
sentences.cn: 直升机坠毁在附近的地面上。

sentences.en: The two wounded men were taken to a nearby hospital.
sentences.cn: 两名受伤男子被送到附近医院。

sentences.en: There were one or two suspicious looks from nearby.
sentences.cn: 附近有一两个人投来怀疑的目光。

sentences.en: They turned their telescopes towards other nearby galaxies.
sentences.cn: 他们把望远镜转向附近其他星系。

sentences.en: Though they all live nearby, I lost contact with them really quickly.
sentences.cn: 虽然他们都住在附近，但我很快与他们失去了联系。

sentences.en: Two more bodies were found nearby after the shooting.
sentences.cn: 枪击事件后附近又发现了两具尸体。

trans.tran_en: If something is nearby, it is only a short distance away
